LTCA2_ID

"LTCA2 Identification Register"

AddressLTCA2_ID_ADDR = 0xF0002808
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x002AC0XX
C typeLTCA2_ID_t

LTCA2_ID.bits "LTCA2 Identification Register"
Mask:LTCA2_ID_MASK = 0xffffffff
Masks:  LTCA2_ID_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_ID_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD_REV 8 0 - 7 r 0x000000ff Module Revision Number
MOD_TYPE 8 8 - 15 r 0x0000ff00 Module Number Value
MOD_NUM 16 16 - 31 r 0xffff0000 Module Number Value
 readable0xffffffff 
writeable0x00000000
volatile0x00000000


Top

 

LTCA2_SRSC2

"LTCA2 Service Request State Clear Register 2"

AddressLTCA2_SRSC2_ADDR = 0xF0002820
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_SRSC2_t

LTCA2_SRSC2.bits "LTCA2 Service Request State Clear Register 2"
Mask:LTCA2_SRSC2_MASK = 0xffffffff
Masks:  LTCA2_SRSC2_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_SRSC2_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
LTC0 1 0 - 0 rwh 0x00000001 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC1 1 1 - 1 rwh 0x00000002 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC2 1 2 - 2 rwh 0x00000004 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC3 1 3 - 3 rwh 0x00000008 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC4 1 4 - 4 rwh 0x00000010 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC5 1 5 - 5 rwh 0x00000020 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC6 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC7 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC8 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC9 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC10 1 10 - 10 rwh 0x00000400 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC11 1 11 - 11 rwh 0x00000800 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC12 1 12 - 12 rwh 0x00001000 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC13 1 13 - 13 rwh 0x00002000 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC14 1 14 - 14 rwh 0x00004000 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.

1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.

LTCA2_MRACTL

"Multiplexer Register Array Control Register"

AddressLTCA2_MRACTL_ADDR = 0xF0002838
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_MRACTL_t

LTCA2_MRACTL.bits "Multiplexer Register Array Control Register"
Mask:LTCA2_MRACTL_MASK = 0x00003f07
Masks:  LTCA2_MRACTL_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_MRACTL_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MAEN 1 0 - 0 rw 0x00000001 Multiplexer Array Enable
0 Multiplexer array is disabled; all cell inputs are driven with 0, LTCA I/O lines (pins) are disconnected and FIFO writing is enabled.
1 Multiplexer array is enabled; all cell and I/O line interconnections are established as previously programmed and FIFO writing is disabled.
WCRES 1 1 - 1 w 0x00000002 Write Count Reset
FIFOFULL 1 2 - 2 r 0x00000004 FIFO Full Status
0 FIFO not completely written (write access to MRADIN allowed).
1 FIFO completely written (write access to MRADIN ignored). Must be re-enabled via WCRES before array can be re-initialized.
FIFOFILLCNT 6 8 - 13 r 0x00003f00 FIFO Fill Count
 readable0x00003f05 
writeable0x00000003
volatile0x00000000


Top

LTCA2_LTCCTR00

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 00"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR00_ADDR = 0xF0002A00
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR00.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 00 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR00.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 00 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR00.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 00 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

LTCA2_LTCCTR01

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR01_ADDR = 0xF0002A08
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR01.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 01 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR01.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 01 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR01.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 01 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR01

"Local Timer Cell X Register 01"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR01_ADDR = 0xF0002A0C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR01.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 01"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR02

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 02"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR02_ADDR = 0xF0002A10
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR02.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 02 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR02.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 02 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).

1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.

1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.

LTCA2_LTCCTR03.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 03 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.

1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.

1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.

1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.

0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR03

"Local Timer Cell X Register 03"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR03_ADDR = 0xF0002A1C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR03.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 03"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR04

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 04"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR04_ADDR = 0xF0002A20
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR04.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 04 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR04.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 04 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR04.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 04 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode

1 LTCk is enabled for one event only

1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.

0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line

1 State of select line output SO is 1

1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events

X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.

1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR06.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 06 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR06.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 06 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

"Local Timer Cell X Register 06"

Reset value0x00000000

Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR07

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 07"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR07_ADDR = 0xF0002A38
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR07.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 07 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT

11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

LTCA2_LTCCTR08.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 08 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.

1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.

1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR08

"Local Timer Cell X Register 08"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR08_ADDR = 0xF0002A44
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR08.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 08"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR09

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 09"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR09_ADDR = 0xF0002A48
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR09.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 09 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR09.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 09 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR09.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 09 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode

1 LTCk is enabled for one event only

1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.

0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line

0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1

1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events

X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1

1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action

1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1

Absolute addressableYes

LTCA2_LTCCTR10.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 10 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.

0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.

0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.

1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.

0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.

0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).

1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.

0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR11.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 11 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR11.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 11 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

"Local Timer Cell X Register 11"

Reset value0x00000000

LTCA2_LTCCTR12

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 12"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR12_ADDR = 0xF0002A60
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR12.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 12 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR12.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 12 [Compare Mode]"

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

LTCA2_LTCCTR13.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 13 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.

1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
