0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR13

"Local Timer Cell X Register 13"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR13_ADDR = 0xF0002A6C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR13.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 13"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR14

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 14"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR14_ADDR = 0xF0002A70
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR14.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 14 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR14.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 14 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR14.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 14 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line

0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1

1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.

0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events

X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR16.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 16 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR16.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 16 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR16

"Local Timer Cell X Register 16"

Reset value0x00000000

LTCA2_LTCCTR17

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 17"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR17_ADDR = 0xF0002A88
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR17.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 17 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR18

"Local Timer Cell X Register 18"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR18_ADDR = 0xF0002A94
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR18.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 18"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR19

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 19"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR19_ADDR = 0xF0002A98
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR19.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 19 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR19.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 19 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR19.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 19 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1

1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)

1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass

LTCA2_LTCCTR20.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 20 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.

1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.

1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.

0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).

1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.

1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.

0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR21.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 21 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR21.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 21 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR21

"Local Timer Cell X Register 21"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR21_ADDR = 0xF0002AAC
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000

LTCA2_LTCCTR22

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 22"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR22_ADDR = 0xF0002AB0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR22.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 22 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR22.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 22 [Compare Mode]"

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

LTCA2_LTCCTR23.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 23 [Capture Mode]"

Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.

0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.

1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.

1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR23

"Local Timer Cell X Register 23"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR23_ADDR = 0xF0002ABC
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR23.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 23"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR24

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 24"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR24_ADDR = 0xF0002AC0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR24.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 24 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR24.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 24 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR24.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 24 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT

01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR26.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 26 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR26.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 26 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

"Local Timer Cell X Register 26"

Reset value0x00000000

LTCA2_LTCCTR27

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 27"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR27_ADDR = 0xF0002AD8
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR27.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 27 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT

11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR28

"Local Timer Cell X Register 28"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR28_ADDR = 0xF0002AE4
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR28.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 28"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR29

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 29"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR29_ADDR = 0xF0002AE8
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR29.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 29 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR29.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 29 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR29.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 29 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines

Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.

1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.

1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
