X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR31.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 31 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR31.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 31 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

"Local Timer Cell X Register 31"

Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000

LTCA2_LTCCTR32

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 32"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR32_ADDR = 0xF0002B00
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR32.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 32 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR32.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 32 [Compare Mode]"

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT

11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR33

"Local Timer Cell X Register 33"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR33_ADDR = 0xF0002B0C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR33.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 33"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR34

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 34"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR34_ADDR = 0xF0002B10
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR34.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 34 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR34.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 34 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR34.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 34 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable

1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR36.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 36 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR36.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 36 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

"Local Timer Cell X Register 36"

Reset value0x00000000

LTCA2_LTCCTR37

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 37"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR37_ADDR = 0xF0002B28
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR37.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 37 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR38

"Local Timer Cell X Register 38"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR38_ADDR = 0xF0002B34
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR38.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 38"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR39

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 39"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR39_ADDR = 0xF0002B38
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR39.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 39 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR39.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 39 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR39.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 39 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1

1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)

1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines

LTCA2_LTCCTR40.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 40 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.

1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.

1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.

1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.

0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).

1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR41.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 41 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR41.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 41 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

"Local Timer Cell X Register 41"

LTCA2_LTCCTR42

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 42"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR42_ADDR = 0xF0002B50
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR42.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 42 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.

10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCXR43

"Local Timer Cell X Register 43"

AddressLTCA2_LTCXR43_ADDR = 0xF0002B5C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCXRm_t

LTCA2_LTCXR43.bits "Local Timer Cell X Register 43"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

LTCA2_LTCCTR44

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 44"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR44_ADDR = 0xF0002B60
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR44.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 44 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR44.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 44 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR44.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 44 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines

Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable

1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.

1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.

1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.

1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.

0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR46.comp "Local Timer Cell Control Register 46 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LTCA2_LTCCTR46.timer "Local Timer Cell Control Register 46 [Timer Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_TIMER_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 ILM=0: Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 ILM=0: Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0
1 State of select line output SO is 1
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared)
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines)
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

LTCA2_LTCCTR47

"Local Timer Cell Control Register 47"

AddressLTCA2_LTCCTR47_ADDR = 0xF0002B78
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeLTCA2_LTCCTRm_t

LTCA2_LTCCTR47.capt "Local Timer Cell Control Register 47 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LSBs:LTCA2_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
